Class ProxyConfigurationWindow


  • public class ProxyConfigurationWindow

    The ProxyConfigurationWindow is used to display the user a window with required proxy information he needs to specify in order to download the PluginManager via proxy.

    See Also:
    []

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProxyConfigurationWindow()

      The constructor of the ProxyConfigurationWindow

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and TypeMethod and Description
      BooleanareCredentialsRequired()

      Returns true if the proxy authentication requires credentials, false otherwise.

      voidcloseWindow(BBjCloseEvent event!)

      The event handler method for the main window's on close event.

      BooleandialogCanceled()

      Returns TRUE if the dialog was closed by clicking the cancel button or by closing it using the window's close box. Returns FALSE otherwise.

      voidenableCredentialsInputControls(Boolean enable!)

      Enables the proxy credentials input controls if the given value is true, else the controls will be disabled.

      Returns the entered hostname.

      Returns the entered password.

        Returns TRUE if the dialog was closed by clicking the cancel button or by closing it using the window's close box. Returns FALSE otherwise.

        Returns:
        true if the diallog was cancelled, false otherwise.

      • enableCredentialsInputControls

        public void enableCredentialsInputControls(Boolean enable!)

        Enables the proxy credentials input controls if the given value is true, else the controls will be disabled.

        Parameters:
        enable! The boolean value used to enable the controls.
